LinkItem.internal_link_text: About Disks and VHDs for Virtual Machines
About Disks and VHDs for Virtual Machines

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: $ azure vm disk list ubuntuVMasm info: Executing command vm disk list + Fetching disk images + Getting virtual machines + Getting VM disks data: Lun Size(GB) Blob-Name OS data: --- -------- -------------------------------- ----- data: 30 ubuntuVMasm-2645b8030676c8f8.vhd Linux data: 0 30 ubuntuVMasm-76f7ee1ef0f6dddc.vhd info: vm disk list command OK

$azure vm disk list info: Executing command vm disk list + Fetching disk images data: Name OS data: -------------------------------------------- ----- data: myTestVhd Linux data: ubuntuVMasm-ubuntuVMasm-0-201508060029150744 Linux data: ubuntuVMasm-ubuntuVMasm-0-201508060040530369 info: vm disk list command OK

$azure vm disk create myTestVhd2 .\TempDisk\test.VHD -l "East US" -o Linux info: Executing command vm disk create + Retrieving storage accounts info: VHD size : 10 GB info: Uploading 10485760.5 KB Requested:100.0% Completed:100.0% Running: 0 Time: 25s Speed: 82 KB/s info: Finishing computing MD5 hash, 16% is complete. info: https://portalvhdsq1s6mc7mqf4gn.blob.core.windows.net/disks/test.VHD was uploaded successfully info: vm disk create command OK
$azure vm disk attach ubuntuVMasm myTestVhd info: Executing command vm disk attach + Getting virtual machines + Adding Data-Disk info: vm disk attach command OK

$azure vm disk list ubuntuVMasm info: Executing command vm disk list + Fetching disk images + Getting virtual machines + Getting VM disks data: Lun Size(GB) Blob-Name OS data: --- -------- -------------------------------- ----- data: 30 ubuntuVMasm-2645b8030676c8f8.vhd Linux data: 1 10 test.VHD data: 0 30 ubuntuVMasm-76f7ee1ef0f6dddc.vhd info: vm disk list command OK
